exclusion.criterion: Inability or refusal to provide informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Fasting for less than three hours prior to the scan
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is a pregnant or lactating female
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject with current, significant alcohol consumption
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Subject is unable to reliably quantify alcohol consumption based upon local study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a pacemaker or defibrillator
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Acute hepatitis defined as AST/ALT > 500 U/L
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hep C cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He is off ETOH for a year but has new imbalance leading to a fall.
